title: Agreement Technologies for Coordination in Smart Cities. (arXiv:2401.12259v1 [cs.MA])
abstract: Many challenges in today's society can be tackled by distributed open systems. This is particularly true for domains that are commonly perceived under the umbrella of smart cities, such as intelligent transportation, smart energy grids, or participative governance. When designing computer applications for these domains, it is necessary to account for the fact that the elements of such systems, often called software agents, are usually made by different designers and act on behalf of particular stakeholders. Furthermore, it is unknown at design time when such agents will enter or leave the system, and what interests new agents will represent. To instil coordination in such systems is particularly demanding, as usually only part of them can be directly controlled at runtime. translated_title: 协议技术在智能城市中的协调应用
translated_abstract: 当前社会面临着许多挑战，可以通过分布式开放系统来解决。这在智能城市这样的领域尤其如此，包括智能交通、智能能源网络和参与性治理等。在为这些领域设计电脑应用时，需要考虑一个事实，即系统的元素（通常称为软件代理）通常来自不同的设计师，并代表特定的利益相关者。此外，在设计时无法确定这些代理何时加入或离开系统，以及新代理将代表什么利益。在这样的系统中进行协调是非常具有挑战性的，因为通常只能在运行时直接控制其中的一部分。协议技术是指基于协议概念的一组工具和机制，用于开发这种开放的多agent系统。本文认为，协议技术是解决智能城市协调问题的有效途径。
tldr: 该论文介绍了协议技术在智能城市中的协调应用，以解决智能交通、智能能源网格和参与性治理等领域中的挑战。这些技术基于协议概念，通过开发开放的多agent系统来实现协调。
en_tdlr: This paper discusses the application of agreement technologies for coordination in smart cities, addressing challenges in domains such as intelligent transportation, smart energy grids, and participative governance. These technologies, based on the notion of agreement, enable coordination through the development of open multiagent systems.
